name: June Pugh
text:
Tried calling to place and order 11/8/20
No one would ever answer the phone
So we drove to the Pizza Hut - not a single person was in there to wait on me …More

name: Jackie Campos
text: Great chicken Alfredo pasta with cheesy bread sticks.. For a group, allows you to buy 2 liter sodas, and the garlic knots are filled with mozarella!!

name: Christy Asberry
text: Gotta live those personal pans. Almost a little too much for me, but it's perfect since I can't eat anything larger. These bread and cheese stix with extra sauce and/or garlic dip are yummy. I allow myself a guilt day once a month, so …More

name: Grey Malloy
text: Pizza came out cold after waiting for it to "be ready" for about 15 minutes, the wings were drenched in way too much sauce and undercooked, I subsequently got food poisoning from the uncooked meat. …More

name: Amanda Burton
text: Food is always good and service is always fast.

name: C A
text: Of course I like pepperoni, so I almost always choose pepperoni pizza/personal pan pepperoni. Their cheese sticks are good, but too cheesy for me. I prefer the regular bread sticks myself. Overall good place to get pizza.

name: netsie Florence
text: This is by far the best Pizza hut I have been to in a long time, Pizza fresh and hot, even gave us paper plates because we forgot to grab some at home. Thank you!

name: Jadee Beth
text: This is one of the Absolute Best Pizza Huts that I've ever been to!! And although the quarentine wouldn't allow me to dine in, they are doing Call In- Curb Side Pickup Service. …More

name: Mike Dean
text: Not a bad place. There's not a lot of competition in this town so sometimes you have a bit of a wait. But all in all it is worth it.

name: Larry Smokey Jones
text: Pizza is greasy amd good love the seasoned crust.

name: Annette Sells
text: Needed more help. Kept having to wait on pizza being put out on buffet. Salad bar was a mess and did not have items on it due to lacking of replacing when empty. Ran out of plates and customers were having to use paper plates.

name: Ellie Apgar
text: The service was great and the buffet fully loaded!

name: Leslie Catron
text: Albany Pizza hut is the best always nice and make sure you are happy with everything

name: Michael Taylor
text: Good pizza at a fair price

name: Bonnie Pieri
text: It was very good pizza thank you

name: Joseph Milburn
text: Had an awesome time with the family at Pizza hut

name: Jennifer Gunter
text: I love this pizza

name: Cobra
text: It's a pretty good pizza hut I really like their wings.

name: Debbie Hood
text: The services was wonderful, she never left a glass half empty. The food was great!!! Will be going back.

name: Kathy Poore
text: Awesome service and food

name: Tammy Wright
text: Clean, Love the pizza buffet and spaghetti dinners. Friendly staff that know you by name.  Owner did a good job in updating the place.

name: Stevi Goodan
text: Good pizza and pasta the service is usually good. Good salad bar.

text: Decent quality from a pizza joint in BFE. Better than a lot of the ones I've been to in other towns.
